languages.text: Разведчики докладывают о печальном состоянии местного поселения и его обитателей. Их кожа бледна и прозрачна, глаза, голубые как лед, практически не различают цветов, язык груб и неуклюж, а желудок не принимает ничего, кроме отваров из местных корений и мхов. И все же это жители Империума, верующие в Бога-Императора и принявшие ваших людей за его гонцов.

traits.locale_text: Разведчики докладывают о печальном состоянии местных жителей. Их кожа бледна и прозрачна, глаза, голубые, как лед, практически не различают цветов, язык груб и неуклюж, а желудок не принимает ничего, кроме отваров из местных корений и мхов. И все же это жители Империума, верующие в Бога-Императора и принявшие ваших людей за его гонцов.

languages.text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.
languages.original_text: Разведчики докладывают о печальном состоянии местного поселения и его обитателей. Их кожа бледна и прозрачна, глаза, голубые как лед, практически не различают цветов, язык груб и неуклюж, а желудок не принимает ничего, кроме отваров из местных корений и мхов. И все же это жители Империума, верующие в Бога-Императора и принявшие ваших людей за его гонцов.

traits.locale_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their ice blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and stomachs cannot take anything except the stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for his emissaries.

Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

languages.text: 探险队员报告了这个定居点的情况，说当地的居民的境况极其悲惨。他们的皮肤呈现出半透明的苍白色，冰蓝色的眼睛几乎看不到颜色，所说的语言也是某种粗糙的喉音。他们的胃十分脆弱，无法忍受绝大多数食物，只能吃当地的植物根与苔藓做的炖菜。不过，这些人是帝国的臣民，依然忠于帝皇，还把你的人误认成了祂的使者。
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

traits.locale_text: 探险队员报告了这个定居点的情况，说当地的居民的境况极其悲惨。他们的皮肤呈现出半透明的苍白色，冰蓝色的眼睛几乎看不到颜色，所说的语言也是某种粗糙的喉音。他们的胃十分脆弱，无法忍受绝大多数食物，只能吃当地的植物根与苔藓做的炖菜。不过，这些人是帝国的臣民，依然忠于帝皇，还把你的人误认成了祂的使者。

languages.text: 探検家たちは、入植地とその住民の悲惨な状況を報告している。彼らの皮膚は半透明で青白く、氷のような青い目はほとんど色を識別することができず、言葉遣いは荒々しく、喉の奥から出すような話し方である。またその胃袋は、地元の根や苔から作られたシチュー以外には受け付けない。にもかかわらず、彼らは帝国の臣民であり、依然として皇帝に忠誠を誓っている。彼らあなたの仲間を帝国の使者だと勘違いしている。
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

traits.locale_text: 探検家たちは、入植地とその住民の悲惨な状況を報告している。彼らの皮膚は半透明で青白く、氷のような青い目はほとんど色を識別することができず、言葉遣いは荒々しく、喉の奥から出すような話し方である。またその胃袋は、地元の根や苔から作られたシチュー以外には受け付けない。にもかかわらず、彼らは帝国の臣民であり、依然として皇帝に忠誠を誓っている。彼らあなたの仲間を帝国の使者だと勘違いしている。

languages.text: Los exploradores informan del pésimo estado del asentamiento y de sus habitantes. Su piel es translúcida y pálida, sus ojos azules helados prácticamente no ven los colores, su lenguaje es áspero y gutural y sus estómagos no toleran nada que no sea un guiso hecho con raíces y musgos locales. Y, sin embargo, son súbditos del Imperium, aún leales al Emperador, y han confundido a tu gente con sus emisarios.
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores informan del pésimo estado del asentamiento y de sus habitantes. Su piel es translúcida y pálida, sus ojos azules helados prácticamente no ven los colores, su lenguaje es áspero y gutural y sus estómagos no toleran nada que no sea un guiso hecho con raíces y musgos locales. Y, sin embargo, son súbditos del Imperium, aún leales al Emperador, y han confundido a tu gente con sus emisarios.

languages.text: Die Späher erstatten Bericht über den elenden Zustand der Siedlung und ihrer Bewohner. Ihre Haut ist durchsichtig und fahl, ihre eisblauen Augen sehen praktisch keine Farbe, ihre Sprache ist grob und kehlig und ihre Mägen können nichts tolerieren außer einem Eintopf aus heimischen Wurzeln und Moosen. Und doch sind sie Untertanen des Imperiums, dem Imperator noch immer treu ergeben — sie haben deine Leute für seine Gesandten gehalten.
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

traits.locale_text: Die Späher erstatten Bericht über den elenden Zustand der Siedlung und ihrer Bewohner. Ihre Haust ist durchsichtig und fahl, ihre eisblauen Augen sehen praktisch keine Farbe, ihre Sprache ist grob und kehlig und ihre Mägen können nichts tolerieren außer einem Eintopf aus heimischen Wurzeln und Moosen. Und doch sind sie Untertanen des Imperiums, dem Imperator noch immer treu ergeben — sie haben deine Leute für seine Gesandten gehalten.

languages.text: Les explorateurs rapportent que la colonie et ses habitants sont en piteux état. Leur peau est blafarde et translucide, leurs yeux d'un bleu laiteux ne distinguent presque plus les couleurs, ils parlent une langue rustique et gutturale, et leurs estomacs ne tolèrent plus rien si ce n'est une bouillie à base de racines et de mousses locales. Pour autant, ce sont des sujets de l'Imperium restés fidèles à l'Empereur, à telle enseigne qu'ils ont confondu vos hommes avec Ses émissaires.
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.

Pour autant, ce sont des sujets de l'Imperium restés fidèles à l'Empereur, à telle enseigne qu'ils ont confondu vos hommes avec Ses émissaires.

languages.text: Keşif birliği bu yerleşim yeriyle sakinlerinin hâlinin iç karartıcı olduğunu bildiriyor. İnsanların derisi yarı saydam ve solgun, buz mavisi gözleri neredeyse hiçbir rengi seçemiyor, konuştukları dil kaba ve gırtlaktan çıkıyor, mideleriyse gezegenin yöresel kök sebzeleri ve yosunlarından yapılma bir yahni dışında hiçbir şeyi sindiremiyor. Tüm bunlara rağmen bu insanlar hâlâ İmparatorluk'un tebaasından ve hâlâ İmparator'a sadık... Gönderdiğin adamları da O'nun elçileri sanmışlar.
languages.original_text: The explorers report the dismal condition of the settlement and its inhabitants. Their skin is translucent and pale, their icy-blue eyes see practically no colour, their language is rough and guttural and their stomachs cannot tolerate anything except a stew made from local roots and mosses. And yet they are subjects of the Imperium, still loyal to the Emperor — they have mistaken your people for His emissaries.
